author: VideoGameLord613
title: a FAST FLYER'S CHILD
review: This is an aeroplane, with colors of our flag. They used sword blades for the blasters, and transparent bricks for the window. Anyway, I think this is a really good set to a mini collection. Or how about a Creator collection...

author: tone76
title: Great value for money!
review:
This set came as a free promotional item with a box of Sniggles biscuits around the same time as 7602.  Bought the box of biscuits from my local Coles for AUD$1.99 (the biscuits didn't sell very well hence they were reduced).  From what I remember, the biscuits were aimed at little kids, as they were colourful and individually wrapped for lunch boxes.  The biscuits were also quite tasty.

As for the toy ... it's a nice, simple little aircraft that's quite playable.  The parts themselves are generic enough to use in other projects, adding to playability.  Very good value for money, as the box of biscuits was less expensive than the cheapest Lego Creator sets at the time (around AUD$5).

author: tkettle9719
title: The American Aeroplane!
review:
This is one of the mini models from the Mr. Magorium Creator set, and is my favorite of the bunch. It has a simple, well thought-out design.

Pros

  • -The "American" Color scheme is rather excellent.
  • -The stick pieces for weapons are also a nice little touch.
  • …

Cons

  • -The lamp holder pieces are kind of pointless in this set.
  • -I also don't understand the two tooth pieces.
  • …

Get this set if you don't already have it now, because it really is amazing. It's simple, the color scheme is great, and the pieces are well used.
